news: Dear Users :) The next version wil include multiple languages :) We need people who want to help translate the app and/or check already translated text. We have the following languages till now in the new version English, Dutch, German, Greek, Spanish, French, Japanees and Chinees. Want to help please contact me, also to add new languages. 73 PD2EMC

Dear Testers :) want too play with the windows version check: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1phdBYsV0bFWFn_FGd5cigQKR5XkQFmrK/view?usp=drive_link if you get dll errors after starting the app, install the x86 or x64 dll's within the installer.
Dear Testers :) want too play with a mac version check this link : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cdYUKairqGOvbiEDEWqJF8Z5-yMmZwFb/view?usp=drive_link

Removed HamShackHotline from search, Removed HamShackHotline from contact info, Fixed search button in Dark Mode, Fixed winner button color, Fixed winner page error that occurred in Debug, Fixed Apple version check, Fixed Apple share app link, Small other fixes

header: DMR on the Brink of 300,000 Users
news: 🚀 Almost there! We’re just 23 users away from reaching 300,000 DMR users! Since 2017, we’ve been building and maintaining databases for the community, by the community. Thank you all — let’s hit that 300K together! 🙌📡
A new database has been uploaded to Github. Update thru the database Settings Screen.
A new database has been uploaded to Github. Update thru the database Settings Screen.
